values:
Dear Delilah,

PLS TO STOP BRINGING UP THE BIKINI KTHX.

Yours,
Thatch.
<lj-cut text="To Darrius:">You still need that manslave or what?  <s>I need a distraction.</s></lj-cut>

Alright, so, I survived. But more importantly, Rose survived. But even MORE importantly, we survived each other. Someone up there obviously had pity on me. I still feel like a complete heel, though. Way to be a real Gryffindor, Thatch, acting before even thinking. I think I sort of made it up t her, though. She sorta' smiled at me in the end, anyway. Either that or.. twitched. I wonder if she knows what happened with Terry. I wonder if anyone knows what happened with Terry. By the time Hooch got to us, we'd already sort of.. stopped. Ugh. That's a mighty fine grave you dug there, Smith.

<lj-cut text="Private // Unhackable, except to Al">Thatch Smith--

You are a VERY stupid boy.

No love,
Yourself.</lj-cut>
. . . What the hell did I just do?

So I lost.

But at least blue brings out my eyes.



<font size=1>((OOC: Because Kurai and I are almost never on at the same time, we won't be able to get that Quidditch match log between Thatch and Alexi up in time-- so just pretend it was an AWESOME match <s>because Thatch played awesomely~</s>, V. EXCITING, both players played wonderfully <s>Thatch was better</s> and it was a solid effort from both sides!

We both decided that Alexi would win though, because he's a year older, Thatch was on an old school broom, yada yada, whatever the reason may be.  And SO!  Thatch has now got to wear Ravenclaw's colors for a week.))</font>

<lj-cut text="Private to Al // hastily charmed so it's hackable">Al.

You know that Quidditch match between Rose and Doyle and me?

Yeah.

Don't do it anymore.</lj-cut>
Why does the sex talk only seem to happen in my journal?

((OOC: photoshop is evil D:))
Doyle-- Bugger, why's it gotta' be me? Like I know anything about these things, I was just bored! But.. gah, I guess if I have to... It has to happen when the other one's around right? And.. it's up to the kisser's discretion to mention the bet or not, I guess. And NO PECKS-- real kisses, but, hell, nothing too graphic, either, it's just a bloody dare. -- Thatch

Al is still nowhere to be found. He is, therefore, a wanker and a tosser. I find it very wrong that I'm actually looking forward to school. Could I possibly be--gasp!--growing up? ..No. No, I doubt it, I'm just bored as fuck. WHY DOES IT SEEM LIKE EVERYTHING FUN IS HAPPENING TO EVERYONE ELSE BUT ME?

So Al's still missing.  <s>The wanker.</s>  And what started out as a <s>friendly</s> match between me and Doyle has blown up into a two-on-two MATCH OF THE CENTURY, with <s>Rose</s> Weasley vying for my neck and Doyle waiting to point and laugh.

And I've got to use a school broom.

How fun.
So I got my owl from school today. And I'll be damned.
